org.openjdk.tools.javac.parser

接口 Lexer

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Scanner

    public interface Lexer
    The lexical analyzer maps an input stream consisting of ASCII characters and Unicode escapes into a token sequence.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int errPos()
      Return the position where a lexical error occurred;
      void errPos(int pos)
      Set the position where a lexical error occurred;
      Position.LineMap getLineMap()
      Build a map for translating between line numbers and positions in the input.
      void nextToken()
      Consume the next token.
      Tokens.Token prevToken()
      Return the last character position of the previous token.
      Tokens.Token split()
      Splits the current token in two and return the first (splitted) token.
      Tokens.Token token()
      Return current token.
      Tokens.Token token(int lookahead)
      Return token with given lookahead.

    • 方法详细资料

      • nextToken

        void nextToken()
        Consume the next token.

      • token

        Tokens.Token token()
        Return current token.

      • token

        Tokens.Token token(int lookahead)
        Return token with given lookahead.

      • prevToken

        Tokens.Token prevToken()
        Return the last character position of the previous token.

      • split

        Tokens.Token split()
        Splits the current token in two and return the first (splitted) token. For instance '<<<' is split into two tokens '<' and '<<' respectively, and the latter is returned.

      • errPos

        int errPos()
        Return the position where a lexical error occurred;

      • errPos

        void errPos(int pos)
        Set the position where a lexical error occurred;

      • getLineMap

        Position.LineMap getLineMap()
        Build a map for translating between line numbers and positions in the input.
        返回:
        a LineMap
